awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 16 nominations.

fullplot: After being caught in a scandalous situation days before the election, the president does not seem to have much of a chance of being re-elected. One of his advisers contacts a top Hollywood producer in order to manufacture a war in Albania that the president can heroically end, all through mass media.
plot: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a presidential sex scandal.
title: Wag the Dog

tomatoes.consensus: Smart, well-acted, and uncomfortably prescient political satire from director Barry Levinson and and all-star cast.
